729421f-a.text:

Road (vantage point). Shown is a view of Richmond

Light (Ambrose Channel Light) appearing in the center
background.

729423f-a.text:

showing the abandoned old Public School No. 28. It occupies
the site of the whipping Post, removed in 18E5. A new
S. S. 28 was erected at the S. W. corner of Center Street
Ad St. Patricks Place.
April 26, 1928

729080f-c.text:
Latourette Park (Staten IIsland): A view of the Datorette
House, on the north side of Richmond Hill Road, at the head of
Mill Road. This is the later lLatourette house; another house
stood farther south along Mill Road.
.March 5, 1922
By William T. Davis through P. L. Sperr

729422f-a.text:
Richrond Hill Road, near Old Mill Road (vantage
point. Shown is part of Richrond Hill in an autumn

Island (ighthouse, with mulberry trees appearing on
the left.

By Mulford Simonson
